content: WHEN IT IS OBVIOUS THAT THEY HAVE LIED, WHY SHOULD WE ALLOW IT When they have perjured them selves, why do we allow it. when they have circumvented the same laws and regulations that we have lived by we seem to give them a pass. such as income tax.. one thing that is unfortunate is that the American people are too busy with ordinary life and with real issues, like not enough money to live on to sometimes get involved in the lies that come to them thru the elected officials. look at this guy, he could have made a difference, he popular enough.. "http://www.acepilots.com/vietnam/cunningham.html" this is not a republican thing nor a democratic thing. lets just call it a integrity test that we should insist that our elected officials pass. btw took two gold medals at eastern games and creedmore cup with the M1 Garand

title: SHOULD WE, AND DO WE HOLD OUR ELECTED OFFICIALS TO A DIFFERENT STANDARD

content: We shouldn't but the truth of the matter is they are. Todays politics remind me of an old saying. - "Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas?" - Joseph Stalin

title: SHOULD WE, AND DO WE HOLD OUR ELECTED OFFICIALS TO A DIFFERENT STANDARD

content: Yeah the govt seems less and less for the people, and more elitist. Hell you cant really run for office unless your very wealthy, you swear to one of the two parties, work for small private interest groups or all three. I mean if I didn’t pay 100k in taxes or did half the **** our representatives do I would be in jail.
